data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Idlib, Syria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Idlib, Syria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Idlib, Syria who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Over 94.28 percent of the people of Idlib are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, convict the 2,860 believers in Idlib to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Azerbaijani, Azeri Turk people might believe through him.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Idlib, Syria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Idlib, Syria.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Idlib, Syria has a population of 1,501,000.

We estimate Idlib has 2,860 people who might know Jesus, 83,004 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,415,135 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 524 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Idlib, Syria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

location.name: Idlib
location.cities_list: Idlib, Khān Shaykhūn, Kafranbel, Jisr ash Shughūr, Sarāqib
